title: Proof of concept for app- Based on Live Video - API - FB Messenger, Duo etc - No Design - Functional Only
desc: HiWe need an Expert IOS developer and An Android expert who is familar withFacebook Messenger/Face Time, GoogleDuo app or other[url removed, login to view], WhatsApp, Viber, and LINEWe want to develop a proof of concent/Demo that later will be an app based on the above and control video. This not for a desktop app..but proof of concept for a mobile app.between 2 individual where the calls between the callers are controled by our/your servermeaning you do not need to know the other person # in order to see himas long as he agree to see and talk to each other. we also control some features(basic) and TIMEthe can talk via live video.Ideally you can recommend solutions ..look at other APIS- we are open to what easy to implement and provide good quality video for IOS and Android usersAuth can be with username and pass like in Skype, but no user knows phone # of other user they can talk to. We do not want the 2 users you will test know each other phone # !We want a simple proof of concept that we can see you can do it and it will work- that can produce top Video between 2 people where we control time and issuanceof username and password and both users can use IOS or Android.So after approval button the click - the call connected between both- so they can talk and see each other on video. No chatJust live talk with Video and timed discussion we can control from adminWe can set time lets say 1 MIn and can shut down if we choose.Let us know if you can do and suggestions how you would approach thisWe do not care of design as longs as its work and performance is solid.So what we need built:Login IOS, Login Android usersBoth select username and passwordWhen we allow with button to connect the 2 users - admin site( they see notification the user Icon to talk to)if they both click a button - both be able to talk for lets say via the live video( no chat) for 2 minute with as good quality as FB messenger, Facetime and DueIOS  -> IOSIOS -> Anroid userAndroid - -IOSAndroid - AndroidWe need to make sure all there type of users works -You need to create some interface, Simple DB and show us..it works:) - Proof of conceptWe can shut down the connection from admin if we choose toWe do not care about design. We are open how you write and implement thatWe like maybe to see in web before you actually write a full fledge appThis is just proof of concept and show us it works..Can be the simple app you can write just to show us ..it worksSo small budget please ! for just to see if you can do it ..or show us a detail plan how you would do itBut we do not need a sample proof you can do itThanks!

title: Develop push notifications for iOS app
desc: COMPANY INTRODUCTION"The Local Europe" is a company which publishes nine separate news websites in Europe. We have a site called "The Local Sweden" and another called "The Local Germany", and so on for nine different countries. You can use Google to see them.We also have an iOS app which displays the news from these sites. You can search it on the Apple iTunes store.DEVELOPMENT WORK REQUIREDWe would like to use push notifications so that our journalists can send breaking news alerts to users of our app.This feature was already half-way developed, but it never worked properly. It also used [url removed, login to view] to manage sending the notifications, but we now have more users than our UrbanAirship free account allows. So we would now like to use a custom solution.We will develop the server-side code ourselves. This will work using PHP on our web server. We will build a web-based user interface to send the notifications to Apple's Push Notification Service (APNS).We need an iOS developer for the client side code, so that push notifications can be received on iOS devices from the APNS. When a notification is received, it should carry the headline of the news article, and tapping the headline should open our app at the relevant news page.FURTHER DETAILSIf you wish to see all the code for the existing iOS app, please send me your GitHub username and I will grant you access to our repository there.You will probably have further questions about this project, so please don't hesitate to ask. I imagine we will communicate a few emails back and forth before we agree for work to begin.OUR BUDGETOur budget is flexible and could also be outside the bounds specified on this advert. Please give us a realistic estimate of how long this development might take, including a breakdown of tasks, then tell us your hourly rate. If you need further details before an estimate is possible, please ask.If this project is successful, there is a possibility for ongoing further development of the app, including maybe even a complete re-write.

title: Build an app for garbage collection reminder
desc: Specification for garbage reminder app.Android and AppleI want to have this app as a free service to the residents of my area in Tasmania, Australia so I don’t want to spend a lot.Garbage is collected fortnightly. Collection day is determined by suburb. For example Lanena, my suburb is Fridays on week B.There will be a dropdown menu to select suburb.User sets up how the reminder will be sent – sound, picture and when and how many repeats.App runs in background and alerts similar to calendar alerts.When the reminder comes through there will be a message (different every fortnight) such as “collections over holidays will be the same as normal” “don’t forget to take the lids off glass jars before putting them in the recylcling”Users will be able to open app and find out when is next collection.Future use might be another collection day. At the moment both the recycling bin and garbage bin are collected on the same day. Another bin ( green waste) might be added and that could be on another day – need to allow for that in design of software.ISSUES:Cost, guarantee?Does s/w belong to me – if I want future improvements can I use another developer?What would be the hourly cost for future changes.How are the weekly messages uploaded?What is the annual cost to Apple & Google

title: Ionic 3 & Angular Hybrid App: Register, Login and View Profile pages
desc: I'm looking for an Ionic 3 & Angular developer to build a simple app.The app will have Register and Login pages.Register:- Email- Mobile number- Name- Password- Confirm passwordPOSTs to existing API which will return any validation errors or return access_token to use in future requests.Login:- Email- PasswordPOSTs to existing API which wil return any validation errors or return access_token to use in future requests.My profile:If user is logged in they will be shown a profile page which will GET from an existing API using the access_token. This response will include name and email address which should be displayed to the user.There will be a logout button which will remove the access_token from local storage and show the user the login page.This project should only take a couple of hours as the API is already built and ready for you to use.If the successful candidate does a good job there will be a lot more work to develop the app out.Must speak good English.

They will then be able access customers, we will allow the driver to either set their own prices or go off the pre set calculation through  the app. The driver will be able to register their vehicle under our diamond membership  meaning they own a higher end vehicle. The customer will have a easier an simpler way to call for a ride by just hitting a button, this button will house their home address as the primary address an will calculate the trip from where ever they are to their home address.
